blocks.text: This document explains how to use **Drumee** based on the currently visible features in the interface. Drumee is a cloud workspace that combines **file management, chat, contacts, notes, and personal settings** in one place.

items: Open Drumee in your browser.
Log in using your email account.
Once logged in, you will see the **main workspace** with a top navigation bar and interactive panels.

blocks.text: When creating a new folder, Drumee offers multiple options depending on how you want to use the folder.

items: **Create an external folder** — use this when you want to share files with people outside your workspace.
**Create a private folder** — only you can access this folder. Ideal for personal or sensitive documents.
**Create the folder** — confirms the folder creation with your selected visibility.

blocks.text: Folders appear in your workspace and can be used for file storage, collaboration, and chat contexts.
Each folder in Drumee can act as a **chat space**. This allows you to communicate with collaborators directly inside the folder where files are stored.

items: Messages appear on the right panel.
You can send text messages in real time.
Chat remains tied to the folder and its files.

blocks.text: Example use case: create a folder → invite collaborators → chat and share files in one place.

items: Sent messages show timestamps.
Delivered and read status is visible next to messages.

blocks.text: The Contacts window allows you to manage people in your workspace.

items: **All contacts** — displays everyone you have added.
**Tags** — organize contacts into groups.
**Pending invitations** — view people you have invited but who have not yet joined.
**Archives** — archived contacts that are hidden but not deleted.
Click **Contact +** in the top banner.
Enter the contact details.
Send the invitation.

blocks.text: Notes open in a dedicated window and are designed for quick writing and personal organization.

items: Each note includes a **timestamp**.
Notes can be used for personal reminders.
Notes can be used for meeting notes.
Notes can be used for quick drafts.
Click the **save icon** to store the note.
Notes are automatically stored in your workspace.
Shows recent actions and updates.
Use **Mark as all read** to clear notifications.

blocks.text: This helps you keep track of messages, file updates, and system actions.

items: Click **Customize Background**.
Choose from built-in images or **upload your own image** (maximum 10 MB).
Select a **theme color**.
Click **Apply & Save** to confirm.

blocks.text: Access account settings from the top-right user menu.
You can update your personal information, including your name and avatar.
Click **Apply all and save** to confirm changes.

items: Go to **Settings → Storage**.
View total storage used and remaining quota.
See storage usage by file type: Video, Image, Note, All files.
Click **Upgrade plan** to increase your storage capacity.
Change your password from **Settings → Security**.
CEnable MFA for additional account security.
MFA adds an extra verification step during login.
Use **Logout** to securely end your session on the current device.
Use **private folders** for sensitive files.
Use **external folders** for collaboration with outside users.
Organize contacts with tags for faster communication.
Enable **MFA** to protect your account.
Monitor storage usage regularly.
